description: MainActivity.kt defines the main activity of a Tic Tac Toe Android application. It sets up the user interface programmatically, manages game state, handles user interactions such as cell clicks and game resets, and implements win/draw detection and highlighting logic.

classes.name: MainActivity
classes.description: The primary activity class that handles the game logic, UI setup, and user interactions for the Tic Tac Toe game.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes the activity, builds the UI programmatically, and sets up event listeners for the game.

methods.name: onCellClicked
methods.description: Handles user taps on game cells, updates game state, and checks for game outcome.

methods.name: updateStatus
methods.description: Updates the status text based on the current game state (player turn, win, or draw).

methods.name: disableAllCellsAfterGameOver
methods.description: Disables all game cells once the game concludes.

methods.name: resetGameWithAnimation
methods.description: Triggers a reset of the game state with a fade-in animation for the reset button and status text.

methods.name: resetGame
methods.description: Resets the game board, clears game state variables, re-enables input, and updates the UI.

methods.name: checkWin
methods.description: Checks if the specified player has achieved a winning combination.

methods.name: highlightWinningCells
methods.description: Highlights the cells that constitute the winning line and updates the status color accordingly.

methods.name: applyAlpha
methods.description: Applies transparency to a color based on a given alpha factor.

methods.name: dp
methods.description: Converts density-independent pixels to actual pixel values based on device density.
